shows.title: Total Stress Load / GMO Mosquitoes
shows.first_half: First Half: Med-tech company co-founder and healthy product specialist Douglas Mulhall will discuss how millions of people are falling ill due to the mysterious effects of "total stress load." He'll also present information on what's being done to prevent and reverse this stress and its threat to human health.
shows.second_half: Second Half: C2C's investigative reporter Cheryll Jones will share her interview with environmental activist and Florida Keys Environmental Coalition Director (FKEC) Barry Wray about the dangers of genetically modified mosquitoes.

shows.title: Hidden Dark Forces / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Author and spiritual guide Kaedrich Olsen will present his work and research on the hidden negative forces that influence our world. He'll dive into everything from spirits that cling to the living, to human-made demons, to ancient archonic beings that manipulate our thoughts, emotions, and even global events. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give George a call and discuss whatever's on your mind!
